QuestData.Title: Clans of the Plains
QuestData.Description: While you wait for the emissary to arrive, Sansok Khan is interested to hear how meeting the clans went. She sent me to find you and tell you to meet her in the center of Maruukai to discuss.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Sansok Khan in Maruukai.
QuestData.RewardText:
<As Sansok Khan signs, Okir vocalizes for her.>
While there are many clans of various sizes throughout the plains, Shikaar, Teerai, Ohn'ir, and Nokhud hold the most power.
